attachments.fallback: #11601 Expand Tree items by clicking row/text instead of arrow icon
attachments.text:
*Describe the bug*  
In the Department/Teams section of Settings. users must explicitly click the arrow button to expand/collapse department items which is not user friendly.

*To Reproduce*  
Steps to reproduce the behavior:

1. Go to 'Settings'
2. Navigate to 'Departments/Teams' section.
3. Notice that clicking the text/name doesn't expand/collapse the item.
4. Only clicking the small arrow icon works for expansion/collapse.
fix21.mp4 

*Expected behavior*

Clicking anywhere on the item text/name should expand/collapse the item

Expected Output.

Fix22.mp4 

*Screenshots*

*Desktop (please complete the following information):*

• OS: [e.g. iOS]
• Browser [e.g. chrome, safari]
• Version [e.g. 22]

*Smartphone (please complete the following information):*

• Device: [e.g. iPhone6]
• OS: [e.g. iOS8.1]
• Browser [e.g. stock browser, safari]
• Version [e.g. 22]

*Additional context*  
Add any other context about the problem here.

---

attachments.fallback: #11879 PDF Viewer Zoom Issue: Affects Navigation Controls and Buttons
attachments.text:
*Describe the bug*  
When viewing a PDF file in the file preview, if we try to zoom in, the entire buttons are zooming in.

*To Reproduce*  
Steps to reproduce the behavior:

1. Go to 'Encounters'
2. Click on 'Files' -> "Add Files"
3. Upload a Pdf and zoom it ,
4. Observe that all control buttons size is increasing.
issue1.mp4 

*Expected behavior*  
Only the PDF content should zoom in/out.

*Screenshots*  
If applicable, add screenshots to help explain your problem.

*Desktop (please complete the following information):*

• OS: [e.g. iOS]
• Browser [e.g. chrome, safari]
• Version [e.g. 22]

*Smartphone (please complete the following information):*

• Device: [e.g. iPhone6]
• OS: [e.g. iOS8.1]
• Browser [e.g. stock browser, safari]
• Version [e.g. 22]

Add any other context about the problem here.
